#include "commo.h"
#include "../rcc/graph.h"
#include "../rcc/graph_marshaler.h"
#include "../command.h"
#include "../procedure.h"
#include "../command_marshaler.h"
#include "raft_rpc.h"
#include "macros.h"

namespace janus {

RaftCommo::RaftCommo(PollMgr* poll) : Communicator(poll) {
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent>
RaftCommo::SendRequestVote(parid_t par_id,
                           siteid_t site_id,
                           uint64_t arg1,


                           uint64_t arg2,
                           uint64_t arg3,
                           uint64_t arg4,
                           uint64_t* ret1) {
  /*
   * Example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  Log_info("Candidate %d - sending RPC to request vote from %d", arg2, site_id); 
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {


      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [ret1, ev](Future* fu) {
        /* this is a handler that will be invoked when the RPC returns */
        //uint64_t ret1;
        bool_t vote_granted;
        /* retrieve RPC return values in order */
        fu->get_reply() >> *ret1;
        fu->get_reply() >> vote_granted;
        if(vote_granted == true)
        {
          ev->Set(1);
        }
        else
        {
          ev->Set(2);
        }
        /* process the RPC response here */
        //Log_info("Candidate %d - RPC vote_granted response : %d from %d", arg2, vote_granted, site_id); 
      };
      /* Always use Call_Async(proxy, RPC name, RPC args..., fuattr)
      * to asynchronously invoke RPCs */
      Call_Async(proxy, RequestVote, arg1, arg2, arg3, arg4, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent>
RaftCommo::SendEmptyAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                                  siteid_t site_id,


                                  uint64_t leader_id,
                                  uint64_t term,
                                  uint64_t leaderCommit,
                                  uint64_t* retTerm) {
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  Log_info("Leader %d - sending heart beat to %d", leader_id, site_id); 
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [retTerm, ev](Future* fu) {
        bool_t followerEmptyAppendOK;
        /* retrieve RPC return values in order */
        fu->get_reply() >> *retTerm;
        fu->get_reply() >> followerEmptyAppendOK;
        if(followerEmptyAppendOK == true)
        {
          ev->Set(1);
        }
      };
      /* Always use Call_Async(proxy, RPC name, RPC args..., fuattr)
      * to asynchronously invoke RPCs */
      Call_Async(proxy, EmptyAppendEntries, leader_id, term, leaderCommit, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent>
RaftCommo::SendAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                             siteid_t site_id,
                             uint64_t term, 
                             uint64_t leaderId, 
                             uint64_t prevLogIndex, 
                             uint64_t prevLogTerm, 
                             vector<shared_ptr<Marshallable>> appendEntriesCmds, 
                             vector<uint64_t> appendEntriesTerms, 
                             uint64_t leaderCommit,
                             uint64_t* retTerm
                             ){
  /*
   * More example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  Log_info("Leader %d - sending AE/heart beat to %d, prevLogIndex = %d", leaderId, site_id, prevLogIndex); 
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [retTerm, leaderId, site_id, term, ev](Future* fu) {
        bool_t followerAppendOK;
        /* retrieve RPC return values in order */
        fu->get_reply() >> *retTerm;
        fu->get_reply() >> followerAppendOK;
        Log_info("Leader %d Server %d Ret Term : %d", leaderId, site_id, *retTerm);
        if(followerAppendOK == true)
        {
          ev->Set(1);
        }
        else if(*retTerm > term)
        {
          ev->Set(2);
        }
        else if(*retTerm == 0)
        {
          ev->Set(3);
        }
        else
        {
          ev->Set(4);
        }
      };
      vector< MarshallDeputy> appendEntriesMDCmds;
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      for(auto cmd: appendEntriesCmds){
        MarshallDeputy md(cmd);
        appendEntriesMDCmds.push_back(md);
      }
      Call_Async(proxy, AppendEntries, term, leaderId, prevLogIndex, prevLogTerm, appendEntriesMDCmds, appendEntriesTerms, leaderCommit, fuattr);
        
    }
  }
  return ev;
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> 
RaftCommo::SendString(parid_t par_id, siteid_t site_id, const string& msg, string* res) {
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [res,ev](Future* fu) {
        fu->get_reply() >> *res;
        ev->Set(1);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      Call_Async(proxy, HelloRpc, msg, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}


} // namespace janus
